Name: @marginLeft
Description: The distance from the left edge of the page to the left side of the first label

Name: @marginRight
Description: The distance from the right edge of the page to the right side of the first label

Name: @marginTop
Description: The distance from the top of the page to the top of the first label

Name: @marginBottom
Description: The distance from the bottom of the page to the bottom of the first label

Name: @horizontalGutter
Description: The distance between each row of labels

Name: @verticalGutter
Description: The distance between each column of labels
